original_text: If you do what is right, I will accept you. But if you do not do the right thing, sin will be very near to you. It will be like a wild animal at your door that is ready to eat you. But you must become its master.’
korean_text: 네가 선을 행하면 어찌 낯을 들지 못하겠느냐 선을 행하지 아니하면 죄가 문에 엎드려 있느니라 죄가 너를 원하나 너는 죄를 다스릴지니라

sentences.original_text: If you do what is right
But if you do not do the right thing
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 네가 옳은 일을 하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: sin will be very near to you
sentences.korean_translation: 죄가 너에게 매우 가까이 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: It will be like a wild animal at your door
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너의 문 앞에 있는 야생 동물과 같을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that is ready to eat you
But you must become its master
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그것의 주인이 되어야 한다
